docs.text:
Welcome to Lurch


Full documentation coming soon.
docs.title: Home

docs.text:
webLurch





Goal



  

    

      
Lurch is a mathematical word
        processor
 that checks the reasoning in users' documents, even
        mathematical proofs.

      
This project is rewriting Lurch for the web.

    

    

      

    

  





Status




If you're interested in using Lurch right now, try
   
the desktop version
.


To see the status of this new version in detail, view 
the full webLurch
   documentation
.


To help with development, jump to 
the developer
   documentation
.
docs.title: README
